Uses of Class
players.Player

  • Packages that use Player 
    Package Description
    groupOfCards
    Contains classes simulating a important group of cards in the game (except hands, witch are player's property)
    mainPackage
    Regroups main classes of the game
    players
    Contains classes of players and their related classes or interfaces, such as Strategy and Effect.

    • Uses of Player in groupOfCards

      Methods in groupOfCards with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Deck.giveCardToPLayer​(Player player)
      Gives a card from the deck to the player, when distributing or when a player has to pick one.

    • Uses of Player in mainPackage

      Methods in mainPackage that return Player 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Player Round.getCurrentPlayer​()
      Gives an access to who is the current player.
      Player Round.nextPlayer​(int playerPos, Player currentPlayer)
      Second version of the method, used by other classes such as in a case of effects, to have an access to some functions from the next player
      Methods in mainPackage that return types with arguments of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Player> Game.getPlayers​()
      Give access to other classes to the collection of players, referenced by their name.
      Methods in mainPackage with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Player Round.nextPlayer​(int playerPos, Player currentPlayer)
      Second version of the method, used by other classes such as in a case of effects, to have an access to some functions from the next player

    • Uses of Player in players

      Subclasses of Player in players 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AI
      Defines other players as AI, how they play and the strategy they use Also defines the effect of changing color during the game.
      class  PhysicalPlayer
      Defines the user as a player, and how he can play through the application and the interface.
